thread.title: BRIEF-Vasco Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.65

title: BRIEF-Vasco Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.65

organizations.name: reuters) - vasco data security international inc

text: February 21, 2018 / 9:11 PM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Vasco Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.65 Reuters Staff Feb 21 (Reuters) - Vasco Data Security International Inc : * VASCO REPORTS RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.14 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.65 * Q4 REVENUE $54.5 MILLION VERSUS $47.6 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $197 MILLION TO $207 MILLION * 2018 ‍ADJUSTED EBITDA IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $21 MILLION TO $25 MILLION​ * ‍ Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE OF $0.65 INCLUDES ESTIMATED TAX REFORM IMPACT OF $0.70 PER SHARE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
